test.name: Order robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc

kw.name: Does Directory Exist
kw.doc: Returns True if the given directory exists, False if not.

kw.name: Remove Directory
kw.doc: Removes the given directory, and optionally everything it contains.

kw.name: Create Directory
kw.doc: Creates a directory and (optionally) non-existing parent directories.

kw.name: Get Secret
kw.doc: Read a secret from the configured source, e.g. Robocorp Vault, and return it as a ``Secret`` object.
kw.msg: Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Open Available Browser
kw.doc: Attempts to open a browser on the user's device from a set of supported browsers. Automatically downloads a corresponding webdriver if none is already installed.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

Attempted combinations:

BrowserDownloadError
ChromeFalseMessage: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/home
ChromeTrue

kw.name: Download
kw.doc: An alias for the ``HTTP Get`` keyword.
